A1: public consultations on a draft concept paper on constitutional reform in Armenia
RelatedSentence: The consultations are organized by the Specialized Commission on Constitutional Reforms under the President of the Republic of Armenia , in cooperation with the OSCE Office in Yerevan and the USAID 's Support to National Assembly Programme .
The debate aims to raise public awareness and participation in the constitutional reform process .
The debate aims to raise public awareness and participation in the constitutional reform process .

The Chairman of the Constitutional Court , the Dean of the Law Faculty of the Yerevan State University , high - level representatives from the Justice Ministry , and representatives of international organizations will attend the event .
